200.description: Staking summary grouped by candidate retrieved successfully.

code.description: Status code indicating the result of the operation.

data.description: List of staking details grouped by candidate.

candidateName.description: The name of the candidate validator.

stakedBTCAmount.description: The amount of BTC staked with this candidate.

stakedCoreAmount.description: The amount of CORE staked with this candidate.

candidateEstimatedCoreRewardRate.description: The estimated CORE reward rate for this candidate.

candidateEstimatedBtcRewardRate.description: The estimated BTC reward rate for this candidate.

message.description: Additional information or message about the response.

400.description: Invalid parameters or an error occurred while retrieving the data.

code.description: Error code indicating the result of the operation.
